channel.title: Dragon Slayer
channel.description:
You all should remember this non member quest, right? Dragon Slayer, fight the easy Elvarge and win, correct? I've done this quest even on a level 27 before. Guess what? They gave it one hell of an update. Heading to the island, instead of crash landing, you enter a highly graphical cutscene when Elvarge swoops in, breaths fire on your boat, and sends you down on shore. Upon entering the volcano, you see Elvarge again, stomping the ground. Entering his room, you instantly get hit with his massive fire. He's no pushover anymore, he does serious damage. He hits constant 10s with his fire, his melee is shit though. I actually had to teleport out and think of a new strategy before heading back to win it.
WTF.

item.title: Dragon Slayer
item.dc:creator: @I_Samn_I I Samn I
item.description:
@I_Samn_I wrote:

About the head cutting.

The min age to play runescape is 12/13. Which is why they are making more bloody.
Oh and, i’m not sure if jagex knows this, if your under 12/13 you have broken the TOS/agreement which you agreed to when you joined, meaning they can ban your account without question.

Read full topic

item.title: Dragon Slayer
item.dc:creator: @whothe0 the fu superior
item.description:
@whothe0 wrote:

I didn’t know that. Also, demon slayer has a new cutscene when the gypsy tells u the story of wally useing silverlight on delrith.

Also, when u go to delrith, u are now cut off from anyone and need to kill him urself.

I guess its to make the members game look good. The free quests graphics are shit. It’s about time they updated it if they want more people to go members.
[/quote]

item.title: Dragon Slayer

item.description:
@mod_taharok wrote:

Yea, I just did it on a 40-40-40-40 or close to. I got him on my first try, but I used a strength potion and nearly a full inventory of lobsters. He isn’t a pushover anymore, but you can hide on him if you need to heal or w/e.
